item.title: Rashomon
item.description: For whatever reason my headset decided to play it at the half-speed. I thought that timing goes wrong but didn’t care to check properly so I thought it was a director’s style decision to make it that way. The sound is very unusual, I don’t think I’m going to watch this movie normally after that experience. And it fits the beginning so much, so I fell in love with the movie right away.

item.title: Seven Samurai
item.description:
After finishing the movie, I saw a dream resembling Wolf of Wall Street but with a limited palette, and it was unclear who was more high - the main characters or the more normal people around.

My take is that the movie is high. You can see they had fun doing it. Also it has wisdom elements and construction so I did the second watch/scroll to refine the details there. In that lane the movie is a potent meditation on human character traits and human action in abstract.
